rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if a configured service for checking ISO 3166 country codes is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the dwc:countryCode was EMPTY; COMPLIANT if it can be unambiguously interpreted as a ISO 3166-1-alpha-2; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 country codes" {[https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search]})
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_COUNTRYCODE_STANDARD

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:countryCode a valid ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 country code?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:countryCode a valid ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 country code? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:country was EMPTY; COMPLIANT if value of dwc:country is a place type equivalent to "nation" by the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "The Getty Thesaurus of Geographic Names (TGN)" [https://www.getty.edu/research/tools/vocabularies/tgn/index.html]
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_COUNTRY_FOUND

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dwc:country occur in bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dwc:country occur in bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:phylum is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:phylum was found as a value at the rank of Phylum by the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "GBIF Backbone Taxonomy" {[https://doi.org/10.15468/39omei]} {API endpoint [https://api.gbif.org/v1/species?datasetKey=d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c&name=]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_PHYLUM_FOUND

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dwc:phylum occur at rank of Phylum in bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dwc:phylum occur at rank of Phylum in bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:occurrenceID is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:occurrenceID follows a format commonly associated with globally unique identifiers (GUIDs); otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_OCCURRENCEID_STANDARD

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dwc:occurrenceID occur in bdq:SourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dwc:occurrenceID occur in bdq:SourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:minimumDepthInMeters or dwc:maximumDepthInMeters is EMPTY, or if either are interpretable as not zero or a positive number; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:minimumDepthInMeters is less than or equal to the value of dwc:maximumDepthInMeters; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_MINDEPTH_LESSTHAN_MAXDEPTH

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:minimumDepthInMeters a number that is less than or equal to the value of dwc:maximumDepthInMeters?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:minimumDepthInMeters a number that is less than or equal to the value of dwc:maximumDepthInMeters? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:dateIdentified is EMPTY; AMENDED if the value of dwc:dateIdentified was not a properly formatted ISO 8601-1 date but was unambiguous and was altered to be a valid ISO 8601-1 date; otherwise NOT_AMENDED. bdq:sourceAuthority is "ISO 8601-1:2019" [https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/]
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_DATEIDENTIFIED_STANDARDIZED

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:dateIdentified to a valid ISO date.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:dateIdentified to a valid ISO date.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:family is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:family was found as a value at the rank of Family by the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "GBIF Backbone Taxonomy" {[https://doi.org/10.15468/39omei]} {API endpoint [https://api.gbif.org/v1/species?datasetKey=d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c&name=]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_FAMILY_FOUND

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dwc:family occur at rank of Family in bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dwc:family occur at rank of Family in bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:decimalLongitude is EMPTY or the value is not a number; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:decimalLongitude is between -180 and 180 degrees, inclusive; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_DECIMALLONGITUDE_INRANGE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:decimalLongitude a number between -180 and 180 inclusive?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:decimalLongitude a number between -180 and 180 inclusive? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if either dwc:decimalLatitude or dwc:decimalLongitude were not EMPTY, or either dwc:verbatimLatitude and dwc:verbatimLongitude, or dwc:verbatimCoordinates were not unambiguously interpretable into valid coordinates; FILLED_IN the values of dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude if unambiguous values can be interpreted from dwc:verbatimCoordinates or dwc:verbatimLatitude and dwc:verbatimLongitude, plus dwc:verbatimCoordinateSystem and dwc:verbatimSRS; otherwise NOT_AMENDED
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_COORDINATES_FROM_VERBATIM

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the values of dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude from information in the verbatim coordinates terms.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the values of dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude from information in the verbatim coordinates terms.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dwc:eventDate is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_EVENTDATE_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:eventDate?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:eventDate? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:eventDate is EMPTY or if the value of dwc:eventDate is not a valid ISO 8601-1 date; COMPLIANT if the range of dwc:eventDate is entirely within the range bdq:earliestValidDate to bdq:latestValidDate, inclusive, otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:earliestValidDate default ="1582-11-15",bdq:latestValidDate default = current year
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_EVENTDATE_INRANGE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:eventDate entirely with the Parameter Range?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:eventDate entirely with the Parameter Range? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dcterms:license is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of the term dcterms:license is in the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "Creative Commons" {[https://creativecommons.org/]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_LICENSE_STANDARD

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dcterms:license occur in bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dcterms:license occur in bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:minimumElevationInMeters is EMPTY or the value is not a number; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:minimumElevationInMeters is within the range of bdq:minimumValidElevationInMeters to bdq:maximumValidElevationInMeters inclusive; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:minimumValidElevationInMeters default ="-430",bdq:maximumValidElevationInMeters ="8850"
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_MINELEVATION_INRANGE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:minimumElevationInMeters within the Parameter range?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:minimumElevationInMeters within the Parameter range? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if at least one term needed to determine the location of the entity exists and is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_LOCATION_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in any of the Darwin Core spatial terms that could specify a location?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in any of the Darwin Core spatial terms that could specify a location? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the value of dc:type is EMPTY; AMENDED the value of dc:type if it can be unambiguously interpreted as a value in bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_AMENDED bdq:sourceAuthority is "DCMI Type Vocabulary" [https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-type-vocabulary/]
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_DCTYPE_STANDARDIZED

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dc:type using the DCMI type vocabulary.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dc:type using the DCMI type vocabulary.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dwc:country is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_COUNTRY_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:country?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:country? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:decimalLatitude is EMPTY or does not have a valid value, or dwc:decimalLongitude is EMPTY or does not have a valid value, or dwc:geodeticDatum is EMPTY or does not contain an interpretable value; AMENDED if the values of dwc:decimalLatitude, dwc:decimalLongitude and dwc:geodeticDatum are changed based on a conversion between the coordinate reference systems as specified by dwc:geodeticDatum and bdq:targetCRS, and, if dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters was an interpretable value, the uncertainty from the conversion is added to it, and the value of dwc:coordinatePrecision is provided from the conversion result; otherwise NOT_AMENDED. bdq:targetCRS default = "EPSG:4326" [https://epsg.org]
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_COORDINATES_CONVERTED

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:geodeticDatum and potentially to dwc:decimalLatitude and/or dwc:decimalLongitude based on a conversion between spatial reference systems.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:geodeticDatum and potentially to dwc:decimalLatitude and/or dwc:decimalLongitude based on a conversion between spatial reference systems.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:scientificName is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if there is a match of the contents of dwc:scientificName with the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "GBIF Backbone Taxonomy" {[https://doi.org/10.15468/39omei]} {API endpoint [https://api.gbif.org/v1/species?datasetKey=d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c&name=]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_SCIENTIFICNAME_FOUND

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a match of the contents of dwc:scientificName with bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a match of the contents of dwc:scientificName with bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dwc:occurrenceID is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_OCCURRENCEID_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:occurrenceID?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:occurrenceID? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISTITES_NOT_MET if the value of dwc:countryCode is EMPTY; AMENDED the value of dwc:countryCode if it can be unambiguously interpreted from bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_AMENDED bdq:sourceAuthority default = "ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 country codes" { [https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_COUNTRYCODE_STANDARDIZED

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:countryCode if it can be interpreted as an ISO country code.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:countryCode if it can be interpreted as an ISO country code.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dwc:year is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_YEAR_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:year?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:year? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if one or more of dwc:decimalLatitude, dwc:decimalLongitude, or dwc:countryCode are EMPTY or invalid; COMPLIANT if the geographic coordinates fall on or within the boundary defined by the union of the boundary of the country from dwc:countryCode plus it's Exclusive Economic Zone as found in the bdq:sourceAuthority, if any, plus an exterior buffer given by bdq:spatialBufferInMeters; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "ADM1 boundaries" [https://gadm.org] spatial UNION with "Exclusive Economic Zones" [https://marineregions.org],bdq:spatialBufferInMeters default = "3000"
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_COORDINATES_COUNTRYCODE_CONSISTENT

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Do the geographic coordinates fall on or within the boundaries of the territory given in dwc:countryCode or its Exclusive Economic Zone?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Do the geographic coordinates fall on or within the boundaries of the territory given in dwc:countryCode or its Exclusive Economic Zone? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if either bdq:taxonomyIsMarine or bdq:geospatialLand are not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:dcientificName was EMPTY or the marine/non-marine status of the taxon is not interpretable from bdq:taxonomyIsMarine or the values of dwc:decimalLatitude or dwc:decimalLongitude are EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the taxon marine/non-marine status from bdq:taxonomyIsMarine matches the marine/non-marine status of dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude on the boundaries given by bdq:geospatialLand plus an exterior buffer given by bdq:spatialBufferInMeters; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:taxonIsMarine default = "WORMS" [https://www.marinespecies.org/aphia.php?p=webservice],bdq:geospatialLand default = the spatial union of "NaturalEarth 10m-physical-vectors for Land" [https://www.naturalearthdata.com/http//www.naturalearthdata.com/download/10m/physical/ne_10m_land.zip] and "NaturalEarth Minor Islands" [https://www.naturalearthdata.com/http//www.naturalearthdata.com/download/10m/physical/ne_10m_minor_islands.zip],bdq:spatialBufferInMeters default = "3000"
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_COORDINATES_TERRESTRIALMARINE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the marine/non-marine biome of a taxon from the bdq:sourceAuthority match the biome at the location given by the coordinates?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the marine/non-marine biome of a taxon from the bdq:sourceAuthority match the biome at the location given by the coordinates? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:eventDate is EMPTY or contains an invalid value according to ISO 8601-1; FILLED_IN (1) dwc:day from dwc:eventDate if dwc:day is EMPTY and dwc:eventDate has a precision of a day or finer and is within a single day, (2) dwc:month from dwc:eventDate if dwc:month is EMPTY and dwc:eventDate has a precision of a single month or finer and is within a single month, (3) dwc:year from dwc:eventDate if dwc:year is EMPTY and dwc:eventDate has a precision of a single year or finer and is within a single year, (4) dwc:startDayOfYear and dwc:endDayOfYear if they are EMPTY and dwc:eventDate has a precision of a day or better; otherwise NOT_AMENDED.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_EVENT_FROM_EVENTDATE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to values in any of dwc:year, dwc:month, dwc:day, dwc:startDayOfYear or dwc:endDayOfYear from the content of dwc:eventDate.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to values in any of dwc:year, dwc:month, dwc:day, dwc:startDayOfYear or dwc:endDayOfYear from the content of dwc:eventDate.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if any of dwc:decimalLatitude or dwc:decimalLongitude or dwc:countryCode are EMPTY; AMENDED dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude if the coordinates were transposed or one or more of the signs of the coordinates were reversed to align the location with dwc:countryCode; otherwise NOT_AMENDED
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_COORDINATES_TRANSPOSED

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment of the signs of dwc:decimalLatitude and/or dwc:decimalLongitude to align the location with the dwc:countryCode.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment of the signs of dwc:decimalLatitude and/or dwc:decimalLongitude to align the location with the dwc:countryCode.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:verbatimDepth is EMPTY or the value is not unambiguously interpretable or dwc:minimumDepthInMeters and dwc:maximumDepthInMeters are not EMPTY; FILLED_IN the value of dwc:minimumDepthInMeters and/or dwc:maximumDepthInMeters if they could be unambiguously determined from dwc:verbatimDepth; otherwise NOT_AMENDED
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_MINDEPTH-MAXDEPTH_FROM_VERBATIM

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendments of the values of dwc:minimumDepthInMeters and/or dwc:maximumDepthInMeters if they can be interpreted from dwc:verbatimDepth.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendments of the values of dwc:minimumDepthInMeters and/or dwc:maximumDepthInMeters if they can be interpreted from dwc:verbatimDepth.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority was not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the values of dwc:decimalLatitude, dwc:decimalLongitude, or dwc:stateProvince are EMPTY or invalid; COMPLIANT if the geographic coordinates fall on or within the boundary from the bdq:sourceAuthority for the given dwc:stateProvince (after coordinate reference system transformations, if any, have been accounted for), or within the distance given by bdq:spatialBufferInMeters outside that boundary; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT. bdq:sourceAuthority default = "ADM1 boundaries" [https://gadm.org],bdq:spatialBufferInMeters default = "3000"
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_COORDINATES_STATEPROVINCE_CONSISTENT

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Do the geographic coordinates fall on or within the boundary from the bdq:sourceAuthority for the given dwc:stateProvince or within the distance given by bdq:spatialBufferInMeters outside that boundary?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Do the geographic coordinates fall on or within the boundary from the bdq:sourceAuthority for the given dwc:stateProvince or within the distance given by bdq:spatialBufferInMeters outside that boundary? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:taxonID is not EMPTY or if all of dwc:scientificName, dwc:genericName, dwc:specificEpithet, dwc:infraspecificEpithet, dwc:scientificNameAuthorship, and dwc:cultivarEpithet are EMPTY, FILLED_IN the value of taxonID for an unambiguously resolved single taxon record in the bdq:sourceAuthority through (1) the value of dwc:scientificName or (2) if dwc:scientificName is EMPTY through values of the terms dwc:genericName, dwc:specificEpithet, dwc:infraspecificEpithet, dwc:scientificNameAuthorship and dwc:cultivarEpithet, or (3) if ambiguity produced by multiple matches in (1) or (2) can be disambiguated to a single Taxon using the values of dwc:subtribe, dwc:tribe, dwc:subgenus, dwc:genus, dwc:subfamily, dwc:family, dwc:superfamily, dwc:order, dwc:class, dwc:phylum, dwc:kingdom, dwc:higherClassification, dwc:scientificNameID, dwc:acceptedNameUsageID, dwc:originalNameUsageID, dwc:taxonConceptID, dwc:taxonomicRank, and dwc:vernacularName; otherwise NOT_AMENDED bdq:sourceAuthority default = "GBIF Backbone Taxonomy" {[https://doi.org/10.15468/39omei]} {API endpoint [https://api.gbif.org/v1/species?datasetKey=d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c&name=]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_TAXONID_FROM_TAXON

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:taxonID if it can be unambiguously resolved from bdq:sourceAuthority using the available taxon terms.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:taxonID if it can be unambiguously resolved from bdq:sourceAuthority using the available taxon terms.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dwc:basisOfRecord is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_BASISOFRECORD_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:basisOfRecord?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:basisOfRecord? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available, INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:geodeticDatum is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:geodeticDatum is a valid EPSG code; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority = "EPSG" {[https://epsg.org]} {API for EPSG codes [https://apps.epsg.org/api/swagger/ui/index#/Datum]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_GEODETICDATUM_STANDARD

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dwc:geodeticDatum occur in bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dwc:geodeticDatum occur in bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority was not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:geodeticDatum is EMPTY; AMENDED the value of dwc:geodeticDatum if it could be unambiguously interpreted as a value in bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_AMENDED bdq:sourceAuthority = "EPSG" {[https://epsg.org/]} {API endpoint for dwc:geodeticDatum to EPSG code thesaurus [https://gbif.org./.....TBA]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_GEODETICDATUM_STANDARDIZED

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:geodeticDatum using bdq:sourceAuthority.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:geodeticDatum using bdq:sourceAuthority.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:eventDate is EMPTY; AMENDED if the value of dwc:eventDate was not a properly formatted ISO 8601-1 date but was unambiguous, and was altered to be a valid ISO 8601-1 date; otherwise NOT_AMENDED
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_EVENTDATE_STANDARDIZED

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment of the value of dwc:eventDate to a valid ISO date.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment of the value of dwc:eventDate to a valid ISO date.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if either of the terms dwc:country or dwc:countryCode are EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of the country code determined from the value of dwc:country from the bdq:sourceAuthority is equal to the value of dwc:countryCode; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "ISO 3166-1-alpha-2 country codes" {[https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/#search]})
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_COUNTRY_COUNTRYCODE_CONSISTENT

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the ISO country code determined from the value of dwc:country equal the value of dwc:countryCode?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the ISO country code determined from the value of dwc:country equal the value of dwc:countryCode? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:basisOfRecord is EMPTY; AMENDED the value of dwc:basisOfRecord if it could be unambiguously interpreted as a value in bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_AMENDED bdq:sourceAuthority default = "Darwin Core dwc:basisOfRecord" {[https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#dwc:basisOfRecord]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_BASISOFRECORD_STANDARDIZED

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:basisOfRecord using bdq:sourceAuthority.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:basisOfRecord using bdq:sourceAuthority.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:eventDate is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:eventDate is a valid ISO 8601-1 date; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_EVENTDATE_STANDARD

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:eventDate a valid ISO date?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:eventDate a valid ISO date? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:eventDate is EMPTY, or all of dwc:year, dwc:month, dwc:day, dwc:startDayOfYear and dwc:endDayOfYear are EMPTY; COMPLIANT if all of the following conditions are met (1) dwc:year is EMPTY or dwc:eventDate has a precision of one year or finer and and is within a single year and the provided value of dwc:year matches the year expressed in dwc:eventDate, and (2) dwc:month is EMPTY or dwc:eventDate has a precision of one month or finer and is within a single month and the provided value in dwc:month matches the month represented by dwc:eventDate, and (3) dwc:day is EMPTY or dwc:eventDate has a precision of a day or less and is within a single day and the provided value in dwc:day matches the day represented by dwc:eventDate, and (4) dwc:startDayOfYear is empty or dwc:eventDate has a precision of one day or finer and the provided value in dwc:startDayOfYear matches the start day of the year of the range represented by dwc:eventDate, and (5) dwc:endDayOfYear is empty or dwc:eventDate has a precision of one day or finer and the provided value in dwc:endDayOfYear matches the end day of the year of the range represented by dwc:eventDate; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_EVENT_CONSISTENT

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Are the values in dwc:eventDate consistent with the values in dwc:year, dwc:month, dwc:day, dwc:startDayOfYear and dwc:endDayOfYear?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Are the values in dwc:eventDate consistent with the values in dwc:year, dwc:month, dwc:day, dwc:startDayOfYear and dwc:endDayOfYear? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:verbatimElevation is EMPTY or dwc:minimumElevationInMeters and/or dwc:maximumElevationInMeters are not EMPTY; FILLED_IN the values of dwc:minimumElevationInMeters and/or dwc:maximumElevationInMeters that could be unambiguously interpreted from dwc:verbatimElevation; otherwise NOT_AMENDED"
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_MINELEVATION-MAXELEVATION_FROM_VERBATIM

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment(s) to the values of dwc:minimumElevationInMeters and/or dwc:maximumElevationInMeters if they can be interpreted from dwc:verbatimElevation.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment(s) to the values of dwc:minimumElevationInMeters and/or dwc:maximumElevationInMeters if they can be interpreted from dwc:verbatimElevation.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:dateIdentified is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:dateIdentified contains a valid ISO 8601-1 date; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_DATEIDENTIFIED_STANDARD

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:dateIdentified a valid ISO date?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:dateIdentified a valid ISO date? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if all of dwc:taxonID, dwc:scientificName, dwc:genericName, dwc:specificEpithet, dwc:infraspecificEpithet, dwc:scientificNameAuthorship, dwc:cultivarEpithet are EMPTY; COMPLIANT if (1) dwc:taxonId references a single taxon record in the bdq:sourceAuthority, or (2) dwc:taxonID is empty and dwc:scientificName references a single taxon record in the bdq:sourceAuthority, or (3) if dwc:scientificName and dwc:taxonID are EMPTY and if a combination of the values of the terms dwc:genericName, dwc:specificEpithet, dwc:infraspecificEpithet, dwc:cultivarEpithet, dwc:taxonRank, and dwc:scientificNameAuthorship can be unambiguously resolved to a unique taxon in the bdq:sourceAuthority, or (4) if ambiguity produced by multiple matches in (2) or (3) can be disambiguated to a unique Taxon using the values of dwc:tribe, dwc:subtribe, dwc:subgenus, dwc:genus, dwc:subfamily, dwc:family, dwc:superfamily, dwc:order, dwc:class, dwc:phylum, dwc:kingdom, dwc:higherClassification, dwc:scientificNameID, dwc:acceptedNameUsageID, dwc:originalNameUsageID, dwc:taxonConceptID and dwc:vernacularName; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "GBIF Backbone Taxonomy" {[https://doi.org/10.15468/39omei]} {API endpoint [https://api.gbif.org/v1/species?datasetKey=d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c&name=]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_TAXON_UNAMBIGUOUS

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Can the taxon be unambiguously resolved from bdq:sourceAuthority using the available taxon terms?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Can the taxon be unambiguously resolved from bdq:sourceAuthority using the available taxon terms? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:taxonID is EMPTY, the value of dwc:taxonID is ambiguous or dwc:scientificName was not EMPTY; FILLED_IN the value of dwc:scientificName if the value of dwc:taxonID could be unambiguously interpreted as a value in bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_AMENDED bdq:sourceAuthority default = "GBIF Backbone Taxonomy" {[https://doi.org/10.15468/39omei]} {API endpoint [https://api.gbif.org/v1/species?datasetKey=d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c&name=]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_SCIENTIFICNAME_FROM_TAXONID

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose an amendment to the value of dwc:scientificName using the taxonID value from bdq:sourceAuthority.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose an amendment to the value of dwc:scientificName using the taxonID value from bdq:sourceAuthority.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: POTENTIAL_ISSUE if dwc:dataGeneralizations is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_ISSUE
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ISSUE_DATAGENERALIZATIONS_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:dataGeneralizations?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:dataGeneralizations? Issue for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:countryShapes is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if either dwc:decimalLatitude or dwc:decimalLongitude is EMPTY or uninterpretable, or if dwc:countryCode is NOT_EMPTY; FILLED_IN dwc:countryCode if dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude fall within a boundary from the bdq:countryShapes that is attributable to a single valid country code; otherwise NOT_AMENDED. bdq:sourceAuthority default = "ADM1 boundaries" [https://gadm.org] spatial UNION with "Exclusive Economic Zones" [https://marineregions.org]
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_COUNTRYCODE_FROM_COORDINATES

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:countryCode if dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude fall within a boundary from the bdq:countryShapes that is attributable to a single valid country code.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:countryCode if dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude fall within a boundary from the bdq:countryShapes that is attributable to a single valid country code.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: FILLED_IN the value of dwc:occurrenceStatus using the Parameter value if dwc:occurrence.Status, dwc:individualCount and dwc:organismQuantity are EMPTY; otherwise NOT_AMENDED dwc:occurrenceStatus default = "present"
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_OCCURRENCESTATUS_ASSUMEDDEFAULT

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose an amendment of the value of dwc:occurrenceStatus to the default parameter value if dwc:occurrenceStatus, dwc:individualCount and dwc:organismQuantity are empty.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose an amendment of the value of dwc:occurrenceStatus to the default parameter value if dwc:occurrenceStatus, dwc:individualCount and dwc:organismQuantity are empty.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if (1) dwc:dateIdentified is EMPTY, or (2) dwc:dateIdentified contains an invalid value according to ISO 8601-1, or (3) bdq:includeEventDate=true and dwc:eventDate is not a valid ISO 8601-1 date; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:dateIdentified is between bdq:earliestValidDate and bdq:latestValidDate inclusive and either (1) dwc:eventDate is EMPTY or bdq:includeEventDate=false, or (2) if dwc:eventDate is a valid ISO 8601-1 date and dwc:dateIdentified overlaps or is later than the dwc:eventDate; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority is "ISO 8601-1:2019" [https://www.iso.org/obp/ui/],bdq:earliestValidDate default="1753-01-01",bdq:latestValidDate default=[current day],bdq:includeEventDate default=true
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_DATEIDENTIFIED_INRANGE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:dateIdentified within Parameter ranges and either overlap or is later than dwc:eventDate?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:dateIdentified within Parameter ranges and either overlap or is later than dwc:eventDate? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:class is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:class was found as a value at the rank of Class in the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "GBIF Backbone Taxonomy" {[https://doi.org/10.15468/39omei]} {API endpoint [https://api.gbif.org/v1/species?datasetKey=d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c&name=]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_CLASS_FOUND

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dwc:class occur at rank of Class in bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dwc:class occur at rank of Class in bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dwc:geodeticDatum is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_GEODETICDATUM_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:geodeticDatum?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:geodeticDatum? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:decimalLatitude is EMPTY or the value is not interpretable as a number; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:decimalLatitude is between -90 and 90, inclusive; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_DECIMALLATITUDE_INRANGE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:decimalLatitude a number between -90 and 90 inclusive?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:decimalLatitude a number between -90 and 90 inclusive? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:kingdom is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:kingdom was found as a value at the rank of kingdom by the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "GBIF Backbone Taxonomy" {[https://doi.org/10.15468/39omei]} {API endpoint [https://api.gbif.org/v1/species?datasetKey=d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c&name=]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_KINGDOM_FOUND

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dwc:kingdom occur at rank of Kingdom in bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dwc:kingdom occur at rank of Kingdom in bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dwc:scientificName is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_SCIENTIFICNAME_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:scientificName?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:scientificName? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:order is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:order was found as a value at the rank of Order by the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "GBIF Backbone Taxonomy" {[https://doi.org/10.15468/39omei]} {API endpoint [https://api.gbif.org/v1/species?datasetKey=d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c&name=]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_ORDER_FOUND

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dwc:order occur at rank of Order in bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dwc:order occur at rank of Order in bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:year is not present, or is EMPTY or cannot be interpreted as an integer; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:year is within the range bdq:earliestValidDate to bdq:latestValidDate inclusive; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:earliestValidDate="1582",bdq:latestValidDate=current year
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_YEAR_INRANGE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:year within the Parameter range?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:year within the Parameter range? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:eventDate is not EMPTY or the value of dwc:verbatimEventDate is EMPTY or not unambiguously interpretable as an ISO 8601-1 date; FILLED_IN the value of dwc:eventDate if an unambiguous ISO 8601-1 date was interpreted from dwc:verbatimEventDate; otherwise NOT_AMENDED
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_EVENTDATE_FROM_VERBATIM

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:eventDate from the content of dwc:verbatimEventDate.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:eventDate from the content of dwc:verbatimEventDate.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:decimalLatitude is EMPTY or is not interpretable as a number, or dwc:decimalLongitude is EMPTY or is not interpretable as a number; COMPLIANT if either the value of dwc:decimalLatitude is not = 0 or the value of dwc:decimalLongitude is not = 0; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_COORDINATES_NOTZERO

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Are the values of either dwc:decimalLatitude or dwc:decimalLongitude numbers that are not equal to 0?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Are the values of either dwc:decimalLatitude or dwc:decimalLongitude numbers that are not equal to 0? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if any of dwc:eventDate, dwc:year, dwc:month, dwc:day, dwc:startDayOfYear, dwc:endDayOfYear, dwc:verbatimEventDate are NOT EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_EVENT_TEMPORAL_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in any of the terms dwc:eventDate, dwc:year, dwc:month, dwc:day, dwc:startDayOfYear, dwc:endDayOfYear, dwc:verbatimEventDate?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in any of the terms dwc:eventDate, dwc:year, dwc:month, dwc:day, dwc:startDayOfYear, dwc:endDayOfYear, dwc:verbatimEventDate? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the value of dc:type is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dc:type is found in bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority is "DCMI Type Vocabulary" [https://www.dublincore.org/specifications/dublin-core/dcmi-type-vocabulary/]
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_DCTYPE_STANDARD

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value in dc:type occur as a value in the DCMI type vocabulary?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value in dc:type occur as a value in the DCMI type vocabulary? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL _PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:eventDate is not EMPTY or dwc:year is EMPTY or is not interpretable as a valid year; FILLED_IN the value of dwc:eventDate if an ISO 8601-1 date was interpreted from the values in dwc:year, dwc:month and dwc:day; otherwise NOT_AMENDED.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_EVENTDATE_FROM_YEARMONTHDAY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:eventDate from values in dwc:year, dwc:month and dwc:day.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:eventDate from values in dwc:year, dwc:month and dwc:day.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: POTENTIAL_ISSUE if dwc:establishmentMeans is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_ISSUE
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: ISSUE_ESTABLISHMENTMEANS_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:establishmentMeans?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:establishmentMeans? Issue for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dwc:decimalLongitude is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_DECIMALLONGITUDE_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:decimalLongitude?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:decimalLongitude? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dwc:countryCode is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_COUNTRYCODE_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:countryCode?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:countryCode? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dcterms:license is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_LICENSE_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dcterms:license?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dcterms:license? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:scientificName is EMPTY, or all of dwc:genericName, dwc:specificEpithet and dwc:infraspecificEpithet are EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the polynomial, as represented in dwc:scientificName, is consistent with NOT_EMPTY values of dwc:genericName, dwc:specificEpithet, dwc:infraspecificEpithet; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_POLYNOMIAL_CONSISTENT

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the polynomial represented in dwc:scientificName consistent with the equivalent values in dwc:genericName, dwc:specificEpithet, dwc:infraspecificEpithet?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the polynomial represented in dwc:scientificName consistent with the equivalent values in dwc:genericName, dwc:specificEpithet, dwc:infraspecificEpithet? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: If dwc:geodeticDatum is EMPTY, fill in the value of dwc:geodeticDatum with the value of bdq:defaultGeodeticDatum, report FILLED_IN and, if dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters, dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude are NOT_EMPTY, amend the value of dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters by adding the maximum datum shift between the specified bdq:defaultGeodeticDatum and any other datum at the provided dwc:decimalLatitude and dwc:decimalLongitude and instead report AMENDED; otherwise NOT_AMENDED. bdq:sourceAuthority = "EPSG" {[https://epsg.org/]},bdq:defaultGeodeticDatumt = "EPSG:4326" {[https://epsg.org/crs_4326/WGS-84.html]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_GEODETICDATUM_ASSUMEDDEFAULT

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to dwc:geodeticDatum using the value of bdq:defaultGeodeticDatum if dwc:geodeticDatum is empty. If dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters is not empty and there are not empty values for dwc:latitude and dwc:longitude, amend dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters by adding a maximum datum shift.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to dwc:geodeticDatum using the value of bdq:defaultGeodeticDatum if dwc:geodeticDatum is empty. If dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters is not empty and there are not empty values for dwc:latitude and dwc:longitude, amend dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters by adding a maximum datum shift.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dc:type is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_DCTYPE_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dc:type?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dc:type? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:basisOfRecord is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:basisOfRecord is valid using the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "Darwin Core dwc:basisOfRecord" {[https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#dwc:basisOfRecord]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_BASISOFRECORD_STANDARD

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dwc:basisOfRecord occur in bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dwc:basisOfRecord occur in bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if at least one term needed to determine the taxon of the entity exists and is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_TAXON_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in any of the terms needed to determine that the taxon exists?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in any of the terms needed to determine that the taxon exists? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:minimumDepthInMeters is EMPTY, or the value is not interpretable as number greater than or equal to zero; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:minimumDepthInMeters is within the range of bdq:minimumValidDepthInMeters to bdq:maximumValidDepthInMeters inclusive; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:minimumValidDepthInMeters default="0",bdq:maximumValidDepthInMeters default="11000"
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_MINDEPTH_INRANGE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:minimumDepthInMeters within the Parameter range?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:minimumDepthInMeters within the Parameter range? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:maximumlevationInMeters or dwc:minimumElevationInMeters is EMPTY, or if either is not a number; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:minimumElevationInMeters is a number less than or equal to the value of the number dwc:maximumElevationInMeters, otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_MINELEVATION_LESSTHAN_MAXELEVATION

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:minimumElevationInMeters a number less than or equal to the value of dwc:maximumElevationInMeters?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:minimumElevationInMeters a number less than or equal to the value of dwc:maximumElevationInMeters? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters can be interpreted as a number between 1 and 20037509 inclusive; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_COORDINATEUNCERTAINTY_INRANGE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters a number between 1 and 20,037,509?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:coordinateUncertaintyInMeters a number between 1 and 20,037,509? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:maximumElevationInMeters is EMPTY or the value cannot be interpreted as a number; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:maximumElevationInMeters is within the range of bdq:minimumValidElevationInMeters to bdq:maximumValidElevationInMeters inclusive; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:minimumValidElevationInMeters default="-430",bdq:maximumValidElevationInMeters default="8850"
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_MAXELEVATION_INRANGE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:maximumElevationInMeters of a single record within a valid range
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:maximumElevationInMeters of a single record within a valid range Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:ocurrenceStatus is EMPTY; AMENDED the value of dwc:occurrenceStatus if could be unambiguously interpreted as a value in bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_AMENDED bdq:sourceAuthority default = "Darwin Core dwc:occurrenceStatus" {[https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#occurrenceStatus]} {Controlled Vocabulary Document [https://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/occurrence_status_2020-07-15.xml] }
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_OCCURRENCESTATUS_STANDARDIZED

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:occurrenceStatus using bdq:sourceAuthority.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:occurrenceStatus using bdq:sourceAuthority.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:occurrenceStatus is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:occurrenceStatus is resolved by the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "Darwin Core dwc:occurrenceStatus" {[https://dwc.tdwg.org/terms/#occurrenceStatus]} {Controlled Vocabulary Document [https://rs.gbif.org/vocabulary/gbif/occurrence_status_2020-07-15.xml]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_OCCURRENCESTATUS_STANDARD

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dwc:occurrenceStatus occur in bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dwc:occurrenceStatus occur in bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dwc:occurrenceStatus is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_OCCURRENCESTATUS_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:occurrenceStatus?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:occurrenceStatus? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dwc:decimalLatitude is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_DECIMALLATITUDE_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:decimalLatitude?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:decimalLatitude? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dwc:taxonID is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_TAXONID_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:taxonID?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:taxonID? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:taxonID is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if (1) taxonID is a validly formed LSID, or (2) taxonID is a validly formed URN with at least NID and NSS present, or (3) taxonID is in the form scope:value, or (4) taxonID is a validly formed URI with host and path where path consists of more than just "/"; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_TAXONID_COMPLETE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dwc:taxonID contain a complete identifier?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dwc:taxonID contain a complete identifier? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:genus is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:genus was found as a value at the rank of genus by the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "GBIF Backbone Taxonomy" {[https://doi.org/10.15468/39omei]} {API endpoint [https://api.gbif.org/v1/species?datasetKey=d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c&name=]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_GENUS_FOUND

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dwc:genus occur at the rank of Genus in bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dwc:genus occur at the rank of Genus in bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if all of the fields dwc:kingdom dwc:phylum, dwc:class, dwc:order, dwc:superfamily, dwc:family, dwc:subfamily, dwc:tribe, dwc:subtribe, dwc:genericName are EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the combination of values of higher classification taxonomic terms (dwc:kingdom, dwc:phylum, dwc:class, dwc:order, dwc:superfamily, dwc:family, dwc:subfamily, dwc:tribe, dwc:subtribe, dwc:genus) are consistent with the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "GBIF Backbone Taxonomy" {[https://doi.org/10.15468/39omei]} {API endpoint [https://api.gbif.org/v1/species?datasetKey=d7dddbf4-2cf0-4f39-9b2a-bb099caae36c&name=]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_CLASSIFICATION_CONSISTENT

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the combination of higher classification taxonomic terms consistent using bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the combination of higher classification taxonomic terms consistent using bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if (1) dwc:day is EMPTY, or (2) dwc:day is not interpretable as an integer, or (3) dwc:day is interpretable as an integer between 29 and 31 inclusive and dwc:month is not interpretable as an integer between 1 and 12, or (4) dwc:month is interpretable as the integer 2 and dwc:day is interpretable as the integer 29 and dwc:year is not interpretable as a valid ISO 8601-1 year; COMPLIANT if (1) the value of dwc:day is interpretable as an integer between 1 and 28 inclusive, or (2) dwc:day is interpretable as an integer between 29 and 30 and dwc:month is interpretable as an integer in the set (4,6,9,11), or (3) dwc:day is interpretable as an integer between 29 and 31 and dwc:month is interpretable as an integer in the set (1,3,5,7,8,10,12), or (4) dwc:day is interpretable as the integer 29 and dwc:month is interpretable as the integer 2 and dwc:year is interpretable as is a valid leap year (evenly divisible by 400 or (evenly divisible by 4 but not evenly divisible by 100)); otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_DAY_INRANGE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:day interpretable as a valid integer between 1 and 28 inclusive or 29, 30 or 31 given the relative month and year?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:day interpretable as a valid integer between 1 and 28 inclusive or 29, 30 or 31 given the relative month and year? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:month is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:month is interpretable as an integer between 1 and 12 inclusive; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_MONTH_STANDARD

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:month interpretable as an integer between 1 and 12 inclusive?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:month interpretable as an integer between 1 and 12 inclusive? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:day is EMPTY; AMENDED the value of dwc:day if the value was unambiguously interpreted as an integer between 1 and 31 inclusive; otherwise NOT_AMENDED
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_DAY_STANDARDIZED

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:day as an integer between 1 and 31 inclusive.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:day as an integer between 1 and 31 inclusive.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:month is EMPTY; AMENDED the value of dwc:month if it was able to be unambiguously interpreted as an integer between 1 and 12 inclusive; otherwise NOT_AMENDED
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_MONTH_STANDARDIZED

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose an amendment to the value of dwc:month as an integer between 1 and 12 inclusive.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose an amendment to the value of dwc:month as an integer between 1 and 12 inclusive.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:startDayOfYear is EMPTY or if the value of dwc:startDayOfYear is equal to 366 and (dwc:eventDate is EMPTY or the value of dwc:eventDate cannot be interpreted to find single year or a start year in a range); COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:startDayOfYear is an integer between 1 and 365, inclusive, or if the value of dwc:startDayOfYear is 366 and the start year interpreted from dwc:eventDate is a leap year; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_STARTDAYOFYEAR_INRANGE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:startDayOfYear an integer between 1 and 365 inclusive, or 366 if a leap year?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:startDayOfYear an integer between 1 and 365 inclusive, or 366 if a leap year? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:endDayOfYear is EMPTY or if the value of dwc:endDayOfYear is equal to 366 and (dwc:eventDate is EMPTY or the value of dwc:eventDate cannot be interpreted to find a single year or an end year in a range); COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:endDayOfYear is an integer between 1 and 365 inclusive, or if the value of dwc:endDayOfYear is 366 and the end year interpreted from dwc:eventDate is a leap year; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_ENDDAYOFYEAR_INRANGE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:endDayOfYear an integer between 1 and 365 inclusive, or 366 if a leap year?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:endDayOfYear an integer between 1 and 365 inclusive, or 366 if a leap year? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:eventDate was not EMPTY or any of dwc:year, dwc:startDayOfYear, or dwc:endDayOfYear were EMPTY or any of the values in dwc:year, dwc:startDayOfYear, or dwc:endDayOfYear were not independently interpretable; FILLED_IN the value of dwc:eventDate from values in dwc:year, dwc:startDayOfYear and dwc:endDayOfYear if the value of dwc:startDayOfYear is less than the value of dwc:endDayOfYear; otherwise NOT_AMENDED
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_EVENTDATE_FROM_YEARSTARTDAYOFYEARENDDAYOFYEAR

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:eventDate from values in dwc:year, dwc:startDayOfYear and dwc:endDayOfYear.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:eventDate from values in dwc:year, dwc:startDayOfYear and dwc:endDayOfYear.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; AMENDED value of dcterms:license if it could be unambiguously interpreted as a value in bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_AMENDED. bdq:sourceAuthority default = "Creative Commons" {[https://creativecommons.org/]}
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_LICENSE_STANDARDIZED

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:license using bdq:sourceAuthority.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:license using bdq:sourceAuthority.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:eventDate is EMPTY or if the value of dwc:eventDate is not a valid ISO 8601-1 date; otherwise RUN_HAS_RESULT with the result being the duration (sensu ISO 8601-1) expressed in the dwc:eventDate, in seconds.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: MEASURE_EVENTDATE_DURATIONINSECONDS

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: What is the duration of dwc:eventDate in seconds?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: What is the duration of dwc:eventDate in seconds? Measure of Resolution for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:day is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of the field dwc:day is an integer between 1 and 31 inclusive; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_DAY_STANDARD

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:day an integer between 1 and 31 inclusive?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:day an integer between 1 and 31 inclusive? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: COMPLIANT if dwc:taxonRank is not EMPTY; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_TAXONRANK_NOTEMPTY

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is there a value in dwc:taxonRank?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is there a value in dwc:taxonRank? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:taxonRank is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:taxonRank is in the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT. bdq:sourceAuthority default = "GBIF Vocabulary: Taxonomic Rank" [https://api.gbif.org/v1/vocabularies/TaxonRank/concepts]
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_TAXONRANK_STANDARD

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dwc:taxonRank occur in bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dwc:taxonRank occur in bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:taxonRank is EMPTY; AMENDED the value of dwc:taxonRank if it can be unambiguously matched to a term in bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_AMENDED bdq:sourceAuthority default = "GBIF Vocabulary: Taxonomic Rank" [https://api.gbif.org/v1/vocabularies/TaxonRank/concepts]
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: AMENDMENT_TAXONRANK_STANDARDIZED

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:taxonRank using bdq:sourceAuthority.
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Propose amendment to the value of dwc:taxonRank using bdq:sourceAuthority.Amedment for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:maximumDepthInMeters is EMPTY or is not interpretable as a number greater than or equal to zero; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:maximumDepthInMeters is within the range of bdq:minimumValidDepthInMeters to bdq:maximumValidDepthInMeters inclusive; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:minimumValidDepthInMeters default="0",bdq:maximumValidDepthInMeters default="11000"
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_MAXDEPTH_INRANGE

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the value of dwc:maximumDepthInMeters within the Parameter range?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the value of dwc:maximumDepthInMeters within the Parameter range? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if dwc:stateProvince is EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:stateProvince occurs as an administrative entity that is a child to at least one entity representing an ISO country-like entity in the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "The Getty Thesaurus of Geographic Names (TGN)" [https://www.getty.edu/research/tools/vocabularies/tgn/index.html]
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_STATEPROVINCE_FOUND

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Does the value of dwc:stateProvince occur in bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Does the value of dwc:stateProvince occur in bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the terms dwc:country or dwc:stateProvince are EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the value of dwc:stateProvince occurs as an administrative entity that is a child to the entity matching the value of dwc:country in the bdq:sourceAuthority, and the match to dwc:country is an ISO country-like entity in the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "The Getty Thesaurus of Geographic Names (TGN)" [https://www.getty.edu/research/tools/vocabularies/tgn/index.html]
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_COUNTRYSTATEPROVINCE_CONSISTENT

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Are the combination of the values of dwc:country, dwc:stateProvince consistent with the values in the bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Are the combination of the values of dwc:country, dwc:stateProvince consistent with the values in the bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: EXTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the bdq:sourceAuthority is not available; INTERNAL_PREREQUISITES_NOT_MET if the terms dwc:country and dwc:stateProvince are EMPTY; COMPLIANT if the combination of values of dwc:country and dwc:stateProvince are unambiguously resolved to a single result with a child-parent relationship in the bdq:sourceAuthority and the entity matching the value of dwc:country in the bdq:sourceAuthority is an ISO country-like entity in the bdq:sourceAuthority; otherwise NOT_COMPLIANT bdq:sourceAuthority default = "The Getty Thesaurus of Geographic Names (TGN)" [https://www.getty.edu/research/tools/vocabularies/tgn/index.html]
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: VALIDATION_COUNTRYSTATEPROVINCE_UNAMBIGUOUS

rdf:Description.rdfs:comment: Is the combination of the values of the terms dwc:country, dwc:stateProvince unique in the bdq:sourceAuthority?
rdf:Description.rdfs:label: Is the combination of the values of the terms dwc:country, dwc:stateProvince unique in the bdq:sourceAuthority? Validation for SingleRecord
